title: Modern 1-Bed with Open Concept at Motiv Apartments! #304
posting_body: ['Modern Living in a Historic Neighborhood at Motiv Apartments #304', 'Property Address', '1006 West 24th Street - 304 | Minneapolis, MN 55405', 'Available:', '09/01/2022', 'Offered By', 'At Home Apartments |', 'show contact info', 'Description', 'Walk, bike, or relax near the lakes and grab a latte on your adventure through the Uptown and Lowry Hill neighborhoods.', 'Enjoy walking and biking access to everything in Uptown- and easy transit options to go everywhere else.', 'Built in 2015, Motiv is the destination and hub of your urban lifestyle.', 'All apartments offer modern and convenient living.', 'The building has free bike storage in the bike garage and a rooftop patio with a community grill.', 'Metro transit commuters have stops within two blocks of the building and drivers can easily access the main highways.', 'Apartment 304 is a third-floor corner apartment that offers an open floorplan with modern amenities such as stainless steel appliances including a dishwasher and microwave, in-unit laundry, customizable Ikea PAX closets, Central AC, and quartz countertops.', 'Its East-facing windows brighten up the space with great natural light and views of adjacent residential Colfax Avenue.', 'Built in 2015, Motiv is the destination and hub of your urban lifestyle.', 'Cats are welcome with a $200 pet deposit, 1-time $200 pet fee, and a pet rent of $35/month per cat.', '**Administration fee of $150 due at the lease signing**', 'County: Hennepin • School District: Minneapolis', 'Call the Motiv Leasing Office at', 'show contact info', 'for more information.', 'Additional photos and availability at <URL>.', 'View more properties at <URL>', 'The link below details the average energy costs per bedroom at Motiv (please note that this is an average based on aggregate data for the whole building for the past 2 years, and your monthly bill may differ from this estimate):', '<URL>', 'Note: Apartment photo(s) in this listing are a
